title: Eden
description: "... the last days are not unfolding exactly as written, but make no mistake - Heaven and Hell have fallen to Earth." When an earthquake plunges the world into darkness, Alexandra Contreras struggles for survival and seeks answers. Guided by a mysterious, scarred man, she braves the wasteland in search of humanity's mythical Eden. Once confronted with her tragic destiny, she must make a decision which will alter the fate of the world.
author: Matthew Plourde
